trans-unit.source: Emulates the behavior of a Visual Basic 6.0 fixed-length string.
trans-unit.target: Emula o comportamento de uma cadeia de comprimento fixo do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, a `String` could be declared with a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, um `String` foi declarada com um comprimento fixo.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], fixed-length strings are no longer supported and a new <xref:System.String> is allocated every time the length of the <xref:System.String> is changed.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], cadeias de comprimento fixo são mais não suportada e um novo <xref:System.String>é atribuído sempre que o comprimento do <xref:System.String>é alterado.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The `FixedLengthString` class can be used to emulate the behavior of a Visual Basic 6.0 string, which enables you to declare a string with a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: O `FixedLengthString` classe pode ser utilizada para emular o comportamento de uma cadeia de Visual Basic 6.0, o que permite-lhe declarar uma cadeia com um comprimento fixo.

trans-unit.source: A `FixedLengthString` cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must either reference the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A> property or call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A> method to convert the type.
trans-unit.target: A `FixedLengthString` não é possível converter um <xref:System.String>; tem a referência a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A>propriedade ou chamada a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A>método para converter o tipo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref> class, specifying the length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref> classe, especificando o comprimento.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, you can specify the length of a string in its declaration.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, pode especificar o período de uma cadeia na respetiva declaração.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], you cannot declare a string to have a fixed length unless you use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute> attribute in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], não é possível declarar uma cadeia de ter um comprimento fixo, a menos que utilize o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute>atributo na declaração.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use this class to declare a fixed-length string without using the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta classe para declarar uma cadeia de comprimento fixo sem utilizar o atributo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that specifies the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> que especifica o comprimento da cadeia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref> class, specifying the length and the initial value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref> classe, especificando o comprimento e o valor inicial.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, you can specify the length of a string in its declaration.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, pode especificar o período de uma cadeia na respetiva declaração.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], you cannot declare a string to have a fixed length unless you use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute> attribute in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], não é possível declarar uma cadeia de ter um comprimento fixo, a menos que utilize o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute>atributo na declaração.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.VBFixedStringAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use this class to declare a fixed length string without using the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta classe para declarar uma cadeia de comprimento fixo sem utilizar o atributo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that specifies the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> que especifica o comprimento da cadeia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the initial contents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>Especifica que o conteúdo inicial.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Stores the length of a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o comprimento de um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Stores the value of a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o valor de um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref> para <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString> class can be used to emulate the behavior of a Visual Basic 6.0 string, which enables you to declare a string with a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>classe pode ser utilizada para emular o comportamento de uma cadeia de Visual Basic 6.0, o que permite-lhe declarar uma cadeia com um comprimento fixo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString> cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must either reference the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A> property or call the ToString method to convert the type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>não é possível converter um <xref:System.String>; tem a referência a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A>ou chamada de método ToString para converter o tipo de propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.Value%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o valor do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contents of a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo de um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString> class can be used to emulate the behavior of a Visual Basic 6.0 string, which enables you to declare a string with a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>classe pode ser utilizada para emular o comportamento de uma cadeia de Visual Basic 6.0, o que permite-lhe declarar uma cadeia com um comprimento fixo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString> cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must either reference the Value property or call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A> method to convert the type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>não é possível converter um <xref:System.String>; tem de referenciar ou a propriedade Value ou chamada de <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A>método para converter o tipo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString.ToString%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FixedLengthString>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o valor.</xref:System.String>
